text: Wang Jingguang (1968 â€“ 21 December 2022) was a Chinese movie director. Wang was most known in China as a film director of the movies Never Look Back and Lawless. Jingguang died in on 21 December 2022, at the age of 54. According to the India Herald, he died from COVID-19. After his death, Weibo-users commemorated his legacy. ==References== Category:Chinese movie directors Category:1968 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in China
title: Wang Jingguang
